alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 1:49PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Aitkin, southwestern Cass and northern Crow Wing Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pillager, or 16 miles west of Brainerd, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Baxter and Gull Lake around 205 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Nisswa, Merrifield and Breezy Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass
